name: @linkurious/lke-plugin-csv-importer
description: A plugin to quickly import CSV data into LKE

scripts.copy-assets: cp -R src/public/assets csv-importer.lke/public && cp src/public/index.html csv-importer.lke/public
scripts.installProduction: cp package.json csv-importer.lke &&  cp -R  node_modules csv-importer.lke/node_modules
scripts.build:public: tsc -b src/public && npm run copy-assets && cd src/public/dist && browserify *.js --debug -o ../../../csv-importer.lke/public/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:project  && npm pack  ./csv-importer.lke && npm run gunzip
scripts.gunzip: mkdir -p tmp/github_release && gunzip -qf -c linkurious-lke-plugin-csv-importer-$(cat .version).tgz > lke-plugin-csv-importer.lke && ln -sf $(pwd)/lke-plugin-csv-importer.lke $(pwd)/tmp/github_release/lke-plugin-csv-importer-v$(cat .version).lke

author: Linkurious SAS
